how do i access my fat32 partition from: Try doing sudo fdisk /dev/hda but BE CAREFUL. :P Once in the program hit 'p', and it should should where your FAT partition is. Once that's done, hit q to get out of fdisk.
Don't know if it helps, but this is Linux names IDE PATA drives as /dev/hda, hdb, hdc and h... nevermind. :P
